full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RDO RJE SEMS DPA' BLA MED LUGS KYI SGRUB THABS DANG RJE GNANG BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(DE LTAR RDO RJE SEMS DPA'I BLA MED KYI LUGS KYI RJES GNANG BYED TSUL GYI THO YIG 'DI YANG BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED AER TI NI PAndI TA NO MIN HAN AER TI NI MKHAN PO RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL GYIS BSKUL BA DANG, NYE CHAR YONGS SU 'DZIN PA CHEN PO PAndI TA ZHABS DRUNG BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN GYI ZHAL SNGA NAS KYI GSUNG GIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS ^LCANG SKYA ROL PA'I RDO RJES BLA MA'I PHYAG BZHES BZHIN SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DPYOD LDAN ZHABS DRUNG BSKAL BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS BGYIS PA'O, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
